EmailTemplate.description: Final Reminder to invite partners to Brewery events
EmailTemplate.name: 18-0226 last call NY Brewery Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Call! Thursday Night with BlueWave Solar & Captain Lawrence
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Last call reminder! Come join BlueWave Solar to drink beer & talk solar on Thursday!
WHERE: Captain Lawrence Brewery, 444 Saw Mill River Rd, Elmsford, NY 10523 WHEN: Thursday, March 1st, Anytime after 4pm WHY: Get to know BlueWave, we've just arrived in New York offering solar financing!
Please RSVP to this email today if you'd like to attend.
We hope to see you there! -All of us here at BlueWave
